name: Picky Customers
description:
Picky Customers

Tip: Explore the scene before you serve a customer. Collect items from behind

You are the owner of a unique store and you have very particular customers who are very picky about what they want to buy.... 

Interact with the customer and find out what they require. Search your store for the item(s) (GO THERE) and bring it BACK to them. Be careful not to take too long filling the order these customers have limited patience... 

Keep collecting items and see how long you can last shopping for picky customers!

Made for VimJam - Theme:  There and Back

Music - Audionautix.com

I wanted to make it procedurally generated so that it would add a bit of variety but I didn't get the chance. So it is a bit repetitve.

Known Issues: You can only collect the item from behind it. Gets repetitive after a while.
